Why these colours?

PICKI's colour palette features a mix of playful and vibrant hues, with a soft pink that brings warmth and friendliness, complemented by a fresh green that adds a natural and calming touch. A deep purple provides contrast and depth, while a cheerful yellow adds energy and brightness. Together, these colours create a lively, modern aesthetic with an approachable and dynamic vibe.

Contrast and Acessibility

Purple (#391E99) and White (#FFFFFF)

Contrast Ratio: 11.51:1
This combination has excellent contrast, passing both AA and AAA standards for all text sizes, making it very readable for everyone.

Pink (#FF82BC) and Purple (#391E99)

Contrast Ratio: 5.04:1
It passes the AA standard for normal text, but it fails AAA for small text. It would work better for larger text but may not be as accessible for smaller text.

Yellow (#FFD146) and Purple (#391E99)

Contrast Ratio: 7.95:1
This combination also passes AA and AAA standards for both normal and large text, ensuring good visibility for all users.

Green (#278700) and White (#FFFFFF)

Contrast Ratio: 4.61:1
This combination passes the AA standard for normal text but fails the stricter AAA standard for smaller text. For large text, it meets both AA and AAA standards.
